short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks over 100 news sites as well as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick of opening news sites and social media and losing time and focus while you work? 

This extension blocks them out so you can focus on getting back to work and remaining productive.
